title: 🎨 Support – Thank You for Using Our App
content:
Thank you for using our app!

Each of our apps was created by a parent with love and care — designed to inspire creativity, learning, and confidence in young children through drawing, puzzles, sound games, and early learning activities.

🛠️ Need Help?

If you're experiencing any issues or have questions, please reach out — we're happy to help!

📧 Email: dentin-97.aniline@icloud.com

❓ Common Questions

Q: Do your apps collect any data?
A: No. Our apps do not collect or store any personal data. There are no ads, no accounts, and no tracking.

Q: Can I use the app offline?
A: Yes! All features work fully offline — perfect for car rides, travel, or quiet time without Wi‑Fi.

Q: What age group are the apps for?
A: Most of our apps are designed for kids aged 2–6, with simple, child-friendly interfaces and age-appropriate learning activities.

🔄 App Version

You're viewing the latest support page.
Check your app store listing for version updates.
